title: Lamamra receives Caliph of Tidjanie brotherhood in Djenaba region
text: Minister of Foreign Affairs and National Community Abroad, Ramtane Lamamra received, Thursday in Algiers, the Caliph of the Tidjanie brotherhood of the Djenaba region (Senegal), Sheikh Serine Hassen Sik, who took part to The Algiers International symposium "Imam Mohamed Ben Abd El-Karim El-Maghili: Governance, Stability and Unity of African Societies", organized under the high patronage of the President of the Republic, Mr. Abdelmadjid Tebboune.

During this meeting, the two parties discussed the fraternal relations between the two Algerian and Senegalese peoples, as well as their cooperation in the fields of science and religion deeply rooted in their common history, including the historical role of the Tidjanie brotherhood whose authentic origins are in the city of Ain Madhi, which is a center of spiritual radiance and a destination for millions of followers of the Tidjanie brotherhood around the world, especially in Africa.
